prod_desc.heading: Why Buy Bose QuietComfort II TWS Earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation
features: Activel Noise Cancellation attempts to block out any outside noise to deliver a better audio experience
Built-in Microphones filter out ambient noise to focus on your voice and make your conversations clearer
Aware Mode permits you to hear your environment and engage in friendly conversation
sub_features: To enjoy the true wireless nature of the Bluetooth earphones, and perfect audio quality, the Bose QuietComfort II TWS Earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation are a perfect choice for you. Custom Tune technology automatically adjusts to your ears so you always get the best sound quality. Choose from three sizes of soft ear tips and stability bands to keep you comfortable. Then do a fit test with the Bose Music app to make sure it's a good fit. Go even further with customizable EQ settings in the Bose Music app. You can freely control the bass, midrange, and treble levels. Power all day long with up to 6 hours of battery life on a single charge and a charging case that holds 3 additional charges. Leave your cell phone alone. Control your music, answer calls, and adjust the volume from the top of the earbuds using simple touch.

You like to enjoy music when it is delivered in great quality? Get the Bose QuietComfort II TWS Earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation online. Experience a reliable audio connection with Bluetooth 5.3. When it comes to paying attention, Aware mode gives you enough transparency to hear your surroundings and have friendly conversations. So, what are you waiting for? Order the Bose QuietComfort II TWS Earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation, online, now.

faqs.que: Is it worth getting wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: Yes, they are worthwhile, mainly if you are interested in fitness or travel. Wireless earphones have become much more affordable in recent years. The absence of wires allows for a more excellent range of motion and connectivity with a wide range of devices.

faqs.que: What is the lifespan of wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: You should get roughly two years out of cheap or average-quality earbuds. Best wireless earbuds can endure for four or five years if appropriately purchased. Furthermore, earbuds have a 2 - 4 year average lifespan.

faqs.que: Which is better, earbuds or AirPods?
faqs.ans: The most noticeable difference between traditional EarPods and the new AirPods would be that the AirPods are entirely wireless, while the EarPods are not. For those who had problems keeping the connected EarPods on their ears, the new AirPods are the solution.

faqs.que: Can wireless earbuds be used individually?
faqs.ans: True wireless earphones still use Bluetooth technology, but instead of being incorporated into a wire, the Bluetooth connection is built directly into each earpiece. Because the earbuds are distinct, you may use each separately or join them together for a more immersive music experience.
